attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: need i say more there are better ways to make money than to take money off people who need a bigger car try going shopping with a famly of 4 in a smart car.  and why should i i work hard for long hours so that i can own a nice car my car has a 5 star saftey rating so why sohuld i be raped tax immigrants and cut benifits to single tenage mothers thats a better way to save money
